questions.question: If the moon explodes tonight, what will happen to the werewolves?
Choose the correct sentence using the first conditional:
options: If the aliens land tomorrow, we will invite them for tea.
If aliens landed tomorrow, we invited them for tea.
If the aliens land, we would invite them.
If the aliens had landed, we would have tea.
questions.answer: If the aliens land tomorrow, we will invite them for tea.
